original_text: Festus wanted to make the Jewish leaders happy. So he asked Paul, ‘I would like to judge this problem in Jerusalem. Would you be happy to go there? Then I can decide if what these men are saying against you is true.’
korean_text: 베스도가 유대인의 마음을 얻고자 하여 바울더러 묻되 네가 예루살렘에 올라가서 이 사건에 대하여 내 앞에서 심문을 받으려느냐

sentences.original_text: Festus wanted to make the Jewish leaders happy
sentences.korean_translation: 베스도는 유대 지도자들을 기쁘게 하고 싶었어요

sentences.original_text: I would like to judge this problem in Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 예루살렘에서 이 문제를 재판하고 싶어요

sentences.original_text: Would you be happy to go there?
if what these men are saying against you is true
sentences.korean_translation: 이 사람들이 당신에게 말하는 것이 사실인지
